about_the_game:
Maestro VR is a virtual reality video game that allows you to become a conductor and immerse yourself in a unique and immersive musical experience. Use your hands to follow the tempo, dynamics, and give cues to the musicians while conducting musical pieces from different eras with realistic conducting patterns based on the score. Additionally, you can learn the basics of conducting in the tutorial, earn experience points, gain new titles, and unlock new batons and power-ups that will give you greater freedom to conduct and become a true Maestro.

Fetures



  • Become a conductor in virtual reality.

  • Use your hands to follow the tempo, dynamics, and give cues to the musicians.

  • Immersive symphony orchestra positioned in 3D sound.

  • Conduct musical pieces from different eras.

  • Realistic conducting patterns based on the score.

  • Progression System


    The process of learning to become a conductor is a long and constant journey of learning, practice, and experience. In Maestro VR, you start with a basic baton that forces you to strictly follow the conducting patterns (as a student would). As you accumulate experience, you gain new titles, and more audience attend your concerts. You can also unlock new batons and power-ups that will give you greater freedom to conduct and become a true Maestro.

    - Learn the basics of conducting in the Tutorial.
    - Earn experience points.
    - Obtain titles to get more audience.
    - Unlock Batons that grant you skills.
    - Power-ups with skills per concert.
    - 4 difficulty modes.

  • Creative Mode


    In Creative Mode, you can manipulate the tempo with your hands and load custom MIDI files to customize your orchestra and conduct your own musical pieces. The orchestra play the MIDI file in a spatialized 3D audio, and you can share your MIDI files on the Steam Workshop.

    - Manipulate the tempo with your hands.
    - Load MIDI files to customize your orchestra and direct your own musical pieces.
    - Load custom SoundFonts.
    - The orchestra play the MIDI file in a spatialized 3D audio.
    - Share your MIDI files on the Steam Workshop.

  • Casual Mode


    In Casual Mode, casual players can feel the sensation of conducting quickly and intuitively by moving their hands in the direction of the arrows and giving cues to the instruments.

    - Dedicated to casual players who can quickly and intuitively feel the sensation of conducting.
    - Move your hands in the direction of the arrows and give cues to the instruments.

Maestro VR is a complete and exciting musical experience for any music and video game lover.

movies.name: Trailer Maestro VR - Patch 1.3 - Symphonic Choir

name: Maestro VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: OpenXR and SteamVR compatible. Supports Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive, Valve Index, Meta Quest 2, 3, 3s(via Link), Pimax, and other OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: A compatible VR headset is required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700K / AMD Ryzen 7 5800X or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: OpenXR and SteamVR compatible. Supports Oculus Rift S, HTC Vive, Valve Index, Meta Quest 2, 3, 3s(via Link), Pimax, and other OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: A high-end VR headset is recommended for an optimal experience.

short_description: Maestro VR is an immersive rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Experience the thrill of conducting a symphony orchestra like never before. Feel the music in a way that's unique and unparalleled.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
